title: Here's why the 'Destiny' story was so weak on launch
text: Here's why the 'Destiny' story was so weak on launch Tuesday, 20 October 2015 (7 minutes ago) If you rushed to play Destiny when it first arrived, you probably noticed that the story was a little... thin. But how did it get that way, especially when Bungie is known to have spent years working on a grand vision for the game? Thanks to some...
